conclusion: Violation of Art. 3;Violation of Art. 13;Remainder inadmissible;Non-pecuniary damage - award
externalsources: Report to the Ukrainian Government on the visit to Ukraine carried out by the European Committee for the Prevention of Torture and Inhuman or Degrading Treatment or Punishment (CPT) from 9 to 21 October 2005 (CPT/Inf (2007) 22)
issue: Order of the Ministry of Health no. 45 of 28 January 2005 “On Approval of the Protocol of Medical Assistance for Tuberculosis sufferers” ; Combating Tuberculosis Act of 5 July 2001 ; Order of the State Department for the Enforcement of Sentences of Ukraine and the Ministry of Health of Ukraine no. 186/607 of 15 November 2005 “On the Organisation of Antiretroviral Therapy for HIV Sufferers Held in Penitentiary Institutions and Remand Centres”
judges: Ganna Yudkivska;Isabelle Berro-Lefèvre;Karel Jungwiert;Mark Villiger;Mirjana Lazarova Trajkovska;Peer Lorenzen;Zdravka Kalaydjieva
